author: meerajk
msg: Added RuntimeInfo as part of the ManagementService abstraction.

author: meerajk
msg: Added RuntimeInfo as part of the ManagementService abstraction.

author: mharwood
msg: Added new "CachedFilter" feature to XML syntax enabling any queries or filters to be cached for better repeat performance. Added JUnit test and example XML file. Also fixed ClassCastException in DOMUtils which occured when getAttributeWithInheritance reached the root of a document without finding the required attribute.

author: djd
msg: DERBY-2213 (partial) Add a set of utilities in junit.Derby that allows
test code to determine which Derby functionality is available,
so that tests can exclude themselves if they require tools, engine, client
and/or server. Allows the junit tests to be setup so that they be run
with different classpaths that are a subset of the full set of jars.
